permission_level.label: Permission level
permission_level.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

cooldown_response.value: $user, the command is still on cooldown for $cd seconds!
cooldown_response.label: Cooldown Response
cooldown_response.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 {0} = user 
 {1} = time remaining

pull.label: Pull Response
pull.tooltip: The message that the bot will display when lever is pulled

lost.value: You lost, $user! Better luck next time!
lost.label: Loss Response
lost.tooltip: The message that the bot will display when the user loses

even.value: You broke even. Could be worse...
even.label: Even Response
even.tooltip: The message that the bot will display when the user breaks even

won.label: Win Response
won.tooltip: The message that the bot will display when the user wins small

jackpot.value: 5X Jackpot, $user! You won $amt $currency! Don't spend it all in one place!
jackpot.label: Jackpot Response
jackpot.tooltip: The message that the bot will display when the user wins 5X

super_jackpot.value: 10X SUPER JACKPOT!!! You won $amt $currency! $user is on top of the world now!
super_jackpot.label: SUPER Jackpot Response
super_jackpot.tooltip: The message that the bot will display when the user wins 10X

too_high.value: Bet amount over maximum, you high-roller you...
too_high.label: Over maximum bet
too_high.tooltip: The message that the bot will display when the user bet exceeds the maximum

too_low.value: Bet amount below minimum - you're better than that
too_low.label: Below minimum bet
too_low.tooltip: The message that the bot will display when the user bet does not meet minimum

no_cash.value: Bet exceeds available points! What are you trying to pull???
no_cash.label: Bet exceeds available funds
no_cash.tooltip: The message that the bot will display when the user's poins cannot cover bet amount

no_cash.label: No bet placed
no_cash.tooltip: The message that the bot will display when the user does not place a bet

emotes.label: Emote list
emotes.tooltip: List of five (5) emotes for slots, separated by commas (no spaces), in increasing value order
